123 inline SqliteConnection::SqliteConnection(sqlite3* connection, ConnectionType connectionType)
124 : m_connection(connection), m_connectionType(connectionType)
125 {}
126 
127 inline SqliteConnection::~SqliteConnection()
128 {
129  reset();
130 }
131 
132 inline void SqliteConnection::reset(sqlite3* connection, ConnectionType connectionType)
133 {
134  // close connection only if it is internal
135  if (m_connectionType == INTERNAL_CONNECTION)
136  sqlite3_close_v2(m_connection); // sqlite3_close_v2(NULL) is a harmless no-op
137 
138  m_connection = connection;
139  m_connectionType = connectionType;
140 }
141 
142 inline SqliteConnection::ConnectionType SqliteConnection::getConnectionType() const
143 {
144  return m_connectionType;
145 }
146 
147 inline sqlite3* SqliteConnection::getConnection()
148 {
149  return m_connection;
150 }
151 
152 inline void SqliteConnection::executeUpdate(const std::string& sqlQuery)
153 {
154  const int result = sqlite3_exec(m_connection, sqlQuery.c_str(), NULL, NULL, NULL);
155  if (result != SQLITE_OK)
156  throw SqliteException("SqliteConnection::executeUpdate(): sqlite3_exec failed", result);
157 }
158 
159 inline sqlite3_stmt* SqliteConnection::prepareStatement(const std::string& sqlQuery)
160 {
161  sqlite3_stmt* statement = NULL;
162  const int result = sqlite3_prepare_v2(m_connection, sqlQuery.c_str(), -1, &statement, NULL);
163  if (result != SQLITE_OK)
164  throw SqliteException("SqliteConnection::prepareStatement(): sqlite3_prepare_v2() failed", result);
165 
166  return statement;
167 }
168 
169 inline bool SqliteConnection::startTransaction()
170 {
171  bool wasTransactionStarted = false;
172  if (sqlite3_get_autocommit(m_connection))
173  {
174  executeUpdate("BEGIN;");
175  wasTransactionStarted = true;
176  }
177 
178  return wasTransactionStarted;
179 }
180 
181 inline void SqliteConnection::endTransaction(bool wasTransactionStarted)
182 {
183  if (wasTransactionStarted)
184  executeUpdate("COMMIT;");
185 }
186
